_subject: Your [[${_tu.prop('company.name')}]] WU Transaction is unpaid (Have you forgotten pick up your WU transaction)
_message: Your transaction dated [[${data.date}]] having Trans Ref No: [[${data.refno}]] for [[${data.foreigncurcode}]] [[${data.foreignamount}]] / [[${data.localcurcode}]] [[${data.localamount}]]  has not been picked up by beneficiary. Incase of any queries, call customer care [[${_tu.prop('company.helpno')}]]
